title: Goat Vaccination Day! Protecting My Herd Against Tetanus & Clostridial Diseases

tasks.task: Driving a piece of farm equipment.
subtasks: Sitting on the operator's seat.
Operating the steering wheel to navigate the equipment.
Monitoring the progress by looking out the window.
Inspecting the blue spray (assuming it's a spray applicator) for proper functioning.
Performing a visual inspection of the equipment's condition.
Moving the equipment to an area for operation.
Applying the blue spray as needed during operation.
Ensuring safe operation and handling of the equipment.
Asking about when the previous operator moved out (implying shift handover).
Confirming full-time availability for the task.
Continuously checking on the progress and equipment status.
Performing a periodic visual check (e.g., "Look, look, look!")
Using appropriate equipment and methods, such as the blue spray for application.
